column4: I just read an article about the advantages between gnome and kde, can you run gnome apps on kde and kde apps on gnome? how does that work>
so basicly the main diffrence between gnome and kde is the look of it?
so basicly the diffrence between gnome and kde is the look of it?
They're two different desktops with two different approaches.  Install them both, try them and use the one you like better.
